1203000.name: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3  - The Crystal Menhir Demo
1203000.description:
The year is 50 BC. Gaul is entirely occupied by the Romans... Well, not entirely. A small village of indomitable Gauls still holds out against the invaders. One day, the village druid, Getafix, receives a strange letter. It's a letter from Hella Finidrir, the high priestess of Thule! She warns the druid of a grave threat to his people and asks him to take a mysterious Menhir out of its hiding place...

Set off on an exciting adventure and immerse yourself in the world of Asterix and Obelix! Alone or in co-op, explore the Gaulish village and attack the nearby Roman camp to unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

Demo features:

In this demo, you can discover the beginning of our favorite Gauls' adventure, or get straight into the thick of it by attacking a Roman camp, by Toutatis!

Discover an all-new story in the comic book world of Asterix and Obelix.

Master the mysterious Crystal Menhir in its stone and fire forms and fight every Roman you come across!

For the very first time in the Asterix XXL saga, play in two-player co-op mode with Asterix and Obelix! The ideal adventure to share as a family or with a friend.

You'll find your favorite characters, including Getafix, Cacofonix and Vitalstatistix, as well as brand new characters with hilarious names!
